title: BGH Capital snaffles senior KKR operative
text:
KKR, for years, has been banging on about its special KKR Captsone unit.

KKR Capstone is the team of internal management consultants/Mr Fix-Its who jump into KKR's portfolio companies to drive operational improvements, help with post-merger implementation and the like. It helps create value and, ultimately, is designed to help fetch big paydays for the leveraged buyout firm.

In Australia, KKR called on Matt Claughton, who was a managing director and head of KKR Capstone Asia and based in Sydney.

Private equity firm BGH Capital, spearheaded by Ben Gray (pictured), Simon Harle and Robin Bishop, has a new partner in its ranks. Sanjeev Singh

But the well-regarded Claughton is on the move.

Street Talk can reveal Claughton has agreed to join Australian buyout firm BGH Capital as a partner in its operations group.
